thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Harry Loudon

author: Harry Loudon
title: Harry Loudon
text:
My wife and I had an excellent experience when buying our new car at Motorama last week.
Shaun, the Motorama salesman knew his product and was very good in explaining and demonstrating everything to us.
We met a number of Motorama's staff. They were all pleasant and nothing was too difficult for them. I was even able to insure my second car through them at a very competitive rate. Thanks Shaun and the team at Motorama.
We look forward to having our new car serviced at Motorama and getting the same great service.
